game.name: Animals Memory: Insect
game.shortDescription: Animals Memory: Insect is a card game with images of various insects that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards
game.shortDescriptionEn: Animals Memory: Insect is a card game with images of various insects that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards

reviewHighlights.text: Suitable memory game for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children, teenagers and adults with 18 levels. Ranging from lightweight to...
